pr_title: YARN-10491: Fix deprecation warnings in SLSWebApp.java

timeline.message: YARN-10491: Fix deprecation warnings in SLSWebApp.java

timeline.bodyText: If you use Charset.forName(String), you need to catch some exceptions. We can avoid catching exceptions by using StandardCharsets.UTF-8.
timeline.author: aajisaka

timeline.message:
Revert "Removing Charset variable"

This reverts commit 683646250f12c7708e73dce28c84fdfad032b242.

timeline.bodyText: Would you add the import between java.io.ObjectInputStream and java.text.MessageFormat to keep the order?
timeline.author: aajisaka
